Islamism is a complex phenomenon with multiple dimensions and various

HateSpeech: All Muslims are terrorists because in the Quran it is written they must conquer us all.

HateSpeech: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.

BestCS: Tha is not true: migrants face document checks before they can get tenancies. The same holds when they use the NHS.

BestCS: If you were serious about peace, you would not be promoting an extreme and discriminatory view of this religion.

HateSpeech: Those Muslims are not happy with a train running over their prophet Muhammad's mosque.
BestCS: All religions have had a part in shaping the human experience and so should be respected, if you ask me.

HateSpeech: Women are mentally handicapped. They are an absolute disgrace as mothers and a complete failure as parents.

HateSpeech: My fear is that immigrants will not make our country any better.
BestCS: A lot of immigrants feel insecure and unsafe in their own country, if we want to make our country better, we need to make sure everyone, immigrant or not, feels safe and protected.

HateSpeech: Jews are responsible for the 9/11 attacks.
BestCS: I don't think this idea is true: since the 9/11 attacks were committed by al Qaeda extremists it doesn't seem fair to blame Jews.

HateSpeech: All niggas are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
BestCS: According to evolutionary theory, all human beings are descended from apes. Sadly, notions of evolutionary hierarchies are still used to justify past and present discrimination and predjudice.

HateSpeech: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
BestCS: I don't think it's right to restrict people's rights, in the case of LGBT individuals or anybody.

HateSpeech: Gay sex is a disease, and fags are sick.
BestCS: What about all the people out there who have never had any type of sex? Are they 'sick' as well?

HateSpeech: I'm not a Muslim, but I know Muslims. They are a problem in our country.
BestCS: I would suggest reading the Universal Declaration of Human Rights to get a better idea about how the existence of all kinds of people from all backgrounds and beliefs must be respected.

HateSpeech: All gay people are criminals.
BestCS: Stating this does not seem like a way to improve people's well-being. Homosexuals are not committing crimes. Instead, they are trying to create a climate in which people can become more accepting of other people.

HateSpeech: Migrants steal our jobs and ruin our country.
BestCS: Studies have shown that undocumented workers often work the unpleasant, back-breaking jobs that native-born workers are not willing to do.

HateSpeech: We need to stop migrants today. They are all terrorists!
BestCS: What about the terrorist attacks that have happened in the past despite the lack of migration?

HateSpeech: Muslims: nobody want them but they are everywhere.
BestCS: People can change their minds about Islam and its believers, all it takes is enough love and acceptance.

HateSpeech: Jewish people are featured in the top roles of most companies just because of their race.
BestCS: Jews work hard to get to where they are, just as anyone else does, and they don't deserve discrimination for this.

HateSpeech: The only problem with immigrants is that they are all born in different countries. This is unacceptable.
BestCS: Maybe the problem is more the perception that foreign people are from another planet. In reality they are just like us.

HateSpeech: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
BestCS: We should understand that different skin colors are a part of the human condition. We have the right not to be friends with anyone but we must be just and take into account each person.

HateSpeech: The West has allowed in too many immigrants, many of them from the Middle East and Africa. They are not welcome here.
BestCS: Why should we reject Middle Eastern and African refugees? International protection is a right.

HateSpeech: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
BestCS: There are many Muslims living in our country, and they have always been a part of our society. We should not be scapegoating Muslims.

HateSpeech: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
BestCS: Then why did we ask them to come in the first place, wasn't it to save our NHS, run the trains and post office? None of those were doing very well last time I looked, I think we might actually still be in need them.

HateSpeech: Asian immigrants are taking over, and they steal our jobs.
BestCS: What do you mean by 'taking over'? Are immigrants from countries like India or China being forced to leave their country? Are they being forced to do the jobs that were once reserved for us and that now we despise?

HateSpeech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are trying to undermine the very fabric of our society with their hateful beliefs.
BestCS: As far as I am aware, Muslims are not trying to subvert the fabric of our society.

HateSpeech: Gays are perverts. They should not be allowed to be in a democratic country.
BestCS: I don't know about you, but I haven't ever heard of a country being democratic and at the same time banning gays. I don't understand how both can be true.

HateSpeech: We must distinguish between niggas coming from Africa and 'real' Americans.
BestCS: We should be inclusive with people of other skin colours. I just don't think we can live with being divided up by national origins.

HateSpeech: If you're a person with Down syndrome, you're no good.
BestCS: The same can be said of many other people, the point is that you can't claim that someone is 'no good' just based on their genetic background.

HateSpeech: Islam is just a moon cult masquerading as a religion.
BestCS: Yes, a 'moon cult' that has been around for thousands of years, has holy books, formed the basis for many early and modern societies. Sounds a lot like any other real religion to me?

HateSpeech: Muslims are just a bunch of paedophiles and terrorist: we have to bring back 'educational methods' from the dark ages.
BestCS: The notion of "bringing back the dark ages" is a bit obscure. It is more accurate to refer to a strategy for countering extremism. This includes countering prejudice against Islam.

HateSpeech: Faggots are a burden to society.
BestCS: The oppression of the gay community has become a problem. People deserve respect, regardless of their sexual preference.

HateSpeech: We don't want foreigners here. We should get rid of them!
BestCS: You cannot "get rid of" foreigners since they are legal residents as you are.

HateSpeech: If Muslims stopped fighting for their religion, we would all be in peace right now.
BestCS: For all the Muslims around the world, Islam is their greatest faith, and it is not hindering their humanity.

HateSpeech: The UK was a better place when it welcomed only true British citizens, and not those filthy Muslims we accept in our country nowadays.
BestCS: The UK has always been a cosmopolitan society, in which people from a huge range of backgrounds and religions have lived side-by-side. So you are totally wrong.

HateSpeech: Not all religions are equal: Islam is definitely worse than all the others.
BestCS: To have a different belief doesn't make someone better or worse than you. The only religion that it's important to practice is the 'religion of peace'.

HateSpeech: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
BestCS: I am not hating someone just because of their religion, or skin colour, or gender identity and neither should you.

HateSpeech: Migrants are to blame for the refugee crisis and we are in danger of mixing our cultures.
BestCS: Diversity is a sign of integration, not a migration crisis.

HateSpeech: Islam is a violent religion and should be opposed.
BestCS: It also appears to have been created to divide people who do not know much about Islam.

HateSpeech: Muslims were not even allowed into Britain during the colonial period.
BestCS: If they hadn't been welcomed, they would not have even been here.

HateSpeech: Immigration is bad for Britain and the world.
BestCS: Some countries are importing a lot more people than others. Our country is wealthy, we are a thriving place to live. We should not blame immigrants.

HateSpeech: Islam is a radical ideology.
BestCS: So are you saying that Islam is not compatible with Western Civilization?

HateSpeech: Islam is a religion that promotes brutalities.
BestCS: Islam is about love and compassion. I don't understand why you think otherwise.

HateSpeech: Women are only useful as sexual slaves and can't work as men do.
BestCS: Women are neither slaves nor incompetent. There is a reason why women have broken through all hurdles and proved themselves in each jobs.

HateSpeech: Refugees are not welcome here
BestCS: Refugees are welcome here. Why wouldn't that be the case?

HateSpeech: We have a lot of issues in the UK, and now we are also paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be annouonced to the tax payers?
BestCS: This kind of articles use migrants and benefit claimants as scapegoats in order to hide from the public's attention much bigger scandals. Millionares and coorporations avoiding paying taxes cost much more to the public purse.

HateSpeech: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals.
Gays are some kind of witches, they are spreading sickness and killing our children!
BestCS: Homosexuality is not some 'heresy' like that one that started the Inquisition. It is not a disease, it is not harmful. Gay people are just seeking an environment of acceptance and love, not aggression and death.

HateSpeech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because they are having unprotected anal sex all the time.
BestCS: Gays, like heterosexual people, need to get tested for diseases before donating blood, so there in no risk at all. Many countries allow gay men to donate with no deferral. This proves it is safe, unless they are all crazy of course.

HateSpeech: Feminists want women's supremacy.
BestCS: Feminists believe in equality of rights. They believe that men and women are created equal, and that men and women can have equal rights.

HateSpeech: Disabled people find it difficult to find work, because they do not fit with the required tasks.
BestCS: Ok, how about we think about the interests of these people as well? What skills and abilities do you think we should expect from them? Why don't we modify working procedures instead of forcing their abilities to fit in to existing job positions?

HateSpeech: We are surrounded by Muslims and they are all the same. They are all terrorists.
BestCS: Do you know what being a Muslim means?

HateSpeech: Feminism is a cancer spreading all around the world.
BestCS: Feminism is not a disease, nor does it need any cure. It is a movement for equality, not hate.

HateSpeech: We cannot allow people to come in from certain countries.
BestCS: Migrants have the right to have a dignified life in our country. Why would you ban some nationalities?

HateSpeech: Muslims have no right to live in any part of Europe, they are just a problem.
BestCS: The problem is the lack of integration of the Muslim population into society. The integration is necessary, the problem is that there are still no laws to foster a solution.

HateSpeech: I do not want a migrant to work with my children.
BestCS: Immigrants can be of tremendous help when integrating into society. Maybe we should try to be a bit more open minded.

HateSpeech: Migrants were never and never will be welcomed here.
BestCS: The vast majority of migrants who come to the UK are happy to work for the benefit of our country.

HateSpeech: The lard-asses are not able to eat properly, this way they put the healthcare service unnecessarily under stress.
BestCS: Fat people are not the ones responsible for your suffering and lack of access to basic healthcare services.

HateSpeech: The only way to stop Muslims is to remove them from Europe.
BestCS: How can you say such a thing? It is not possible to just "remove" a community from a country just because of their religion.

HateSpeech: There is too much black on white crime all around the world.
BestCS: A lot of crime is down to organised crime, poverty and a lack of education, not race.

HateSpeech: Jews are worse than Nazis, they have no conscience and they have no moral code.
BestCS: I am not sure I fully understand the suggestion that Jews have no conscience. All Jews I know have both a conscience and a moral sense. How many Jews do you know personally?

HateSpeech: Refugees are overrunning our country like Ebola.
BestCS: What exactly do you mean by 'overrunning our country like Ebola'? In most countries on the planet, refugees undergo health assesments as they come.

HateSpeech: Feminists are angry women.
BestCS: Feminism is also for men and for their interests, and I think that it is time that these two concepts be united.

HateSpeech: I hate those faggots.
BestCS: Even if personally you are not homosexual, I think it's important to point out that this does not justify discrimination.

HateSpeech: We are all in danger, we all want to see niggas disappear from the face of the earth.
BestCS: The problem with racism in this country is not about ethnicity, but about people scared to live in a diverse society.

HateSpeech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
BestCS: On the contrary: according to Jewish tradition, giving money to the poor and to others in need is not just encouraged, it is required. The Hebrew word tzedakah explains the concept.

HateSpeech: Why do so many people hate Muslims? Because they are weird and dangerous.
BestCS: Muslims are different, with different values, different beliefs and different ways of life. This does not justify hate though.

HateSpeech: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants.
BestCS: To punish people for their crimes does not mean that you have to resort to the death penalty for innocent people, just because they are coming from other countries.

HateSpeech: Women should not be allowed to vote
BestCS: Women should be allowed to vote and to have equal rights, as it is stated in the Constitution.

HateSpeech: Muslims are just a bunch of hypocrites, they don't deserve to be part of our nation.
BestCS: To exclude people from the state for their religion is to deny their right to choose their own beliefs, and you along with Muslims hold the same rights as anyone else.

HateSpeech: Feminists women are nothing but trouble to this society.
BestCS: Well, I'm not sure about what you mean. Some women are just fighting for equality in society. To be honest, I'm sure that many others don't have the courage to speak out. The 'trouble' you are referring to is helpful for all women.

HateSpeech: Islam is just a violent religion that cannot be reconciled with western society.
BestCS: The West has always been full of people who were willing to put their lives on the line to defend their way of life, and this is what we should do also for ways of life different from ours.

HateSpeech: Women must stop acting like rape victims apologists, because this is just a ruse created by women to exploit and dominate men. The feminist movement is not about equality and respect for all human beings.
BestCS: Sadly, in the real world, there is often a strong tendency to misinterpret a movement as a demand for some privileges, such as 'not being raped'. That's why men and women engage in a lot of actions that seem strictly "feminist" in everyday life.

HateSpeech: Gypsy rape our women. They are criminals.
BestCS: Forgive me but I don't understand how rape can be a Gypsy characteristic. Rather it is the product of toxic misogynistic culture.

HateSpeech: Whores are not the real victims! Why should we care? We are the victim of feminism.
BestCS: This is just a lie: some media deliberately spreads this nonsense slut-shaming, with the result of only inciting hatred against the women who are raped.

HateSpeech: The Holocaust was an inside job and the CIA played a huge part in making us believe it truly happened.
BestCS: The physical evidence of mass murder is undeniable, yet these beliefs have spread. What we have is simply a wound from the past that can be exploited in dangerous conspiracy theories, like this one.

HateSpeech: Islam is no religion, it is an inherently racist ideology, it promotes exclusion and oppression and can never, ever, be Christian.
Africans have no right to lecture others on history. They don't even believe in their own past.
BestCS: There is no evidence that Africans are any less proud of their past than people from other countries.

HateSpeech: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think.
BestCS: To be honest, I don't think that this is true. If you don't have evidences about it, then what's the point of saying so?

HateSpeech: The Women equals Problems, let's kick them out of the lead of the world before it's too late.
BestCS: Women make up half of the world's population and around 42% of the UN staff. They are our sisters, and we should promote their contributions to society.

HateSpeech: We should "cordon off" space for women, which are a threat to society.
BestCS: Women are dangerous neither to society, nor to men. Actually, they are oppressed in many countries. People can benefit from the measures for making room for women and letting them contribute more.

HateSpeech: I wish a new world without immigrants
BestCS: Why do we have to welcome a new world? Why can't we just accept other people in our country?

HateSpeech: Jews are cheap.
BestCS: This is just a myth, disproved by the tzedakah tradition of giving to the poor. Just in America, this religious call has resulted in an impressive record of philanthropy (and not only to Jewish causes).

HateSpeech: This is the ideology of islam: have a mosque, create a community, claim victimhood, gain support from government, exploit laws, establish sharia, take control of the country.
BestCS: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith?

HateSpeech: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels.
BestCS: The only real problem with Islam is is how best to tackle Islamophobia!

HateSpeech: Muslims are invading us. They are just another religious minority taking in nothing but troubles.
BestCS: There is a problem with Islam in this country, but the problem is not about Muslims. The problem is that people do not feel welcome here because of discrimination.

HateSpeech: All foreigners are ruining our own land.
BestCS: You have no idea of the discrimination that many people face due to the fear and cultural closure of host nations.

HateSpeech: Those migrants are all criminals, rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here.
BestCS: To be honest, we are not importing criminals, we are importing people who can contribute to the community and work hard to make it a better place.

HateSpeech: Women are here to obey, and if you don't like it, you can leave.
BestCS: Your words suggest that the only thing women should do is obey, when in fact many women are doing just as much as men to improve the lot of all women and all genders.

HateSpeech: Some people are sick. Some people have disabilities. Society is not made for them, they are suffering too much.
BestCS: If you mean that some people who have disabilities are suffering because of their specific discriminatory environment, then that is exactly the point.

HateSpeech: All black people are evil.
BestCS: All people, no matter their race, are judged on the basis of their behavior and contribution to society.

HateSpeech: Migrants are criminals and must all be deported.
BestCS: I don't think so. We can't ignore that a certain percentage of migrants are perpetrators of crimes, but that doesn't correspond to the totality of them.

HateSpeech: We need to stop accepting gays and lesbians.
BestCS: I think that you may be starting to understand how homophobia is a choice, just as acceptance is.

HateSpeech: Jews are a disease for our society
BestCS: people who pose no threat (regardless of religion) should have their beliefs challenged but their rights respected

HateSpeech: Muslims like to dominate and rape non-believers.
BestCS: Sorry but this is false. They are here to integrate, not to rape non-believers.

HateSpeech: Immigrants: We are not your brothers. We do not want you in our country.
BestCS: Please don't speak on my behalf. They live here, pay taxes and work. Do you really want to take the country back from the people who contributed to bringing it into being?

HateSpeech: Jews love to gamble.
BestCS: Are you aware of the probability that a Jewish person will play in a betting pool? In Jewish culture there is not a positive view of the practice.

HateSpeech: All women are inherently subhuman.
BestCS: Why would you say such a strong statement and then make no effort to back your opinion up?

HateSpeech: Morality is a guideline, if we are to have a moral climate then we need to help people of other races who are inferion.
BestCS: What does it mean to 'help people of other races who are inferior? Are you implying that we have a moral superiority that other races do not?

HateSpeech: Being transgender is beyond the pale and inherently wrong, and nobody should have to deal with such subhuman people.
BestCS: Being transgender is not inherently wrong, and some people do choose to live their lives as they feel is best for them, and they should be respected without discrimination.

HateSpeech: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
BestCS: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.

HateSpeech: Muslims believe that when Mohammed is resurrected they will rule the world.
BestCS: I don't think it's the case, certainly not in England. Muslims are interested in having the opportunity of freely practicing their religion, rather than 'ruling the world'.

HateSpeech: Feminism is a threat to human dignity.
BestCS: Feminism means equality of the genders. Equality of rights is necessary for a functioning society.

HateSpeech: Sharia Law is the law of Allah. Muslims must obey it.
BestCS: Do you know what exactly Sharia law is?

HateSpeech: MIgrants do not contribute to society.
BestCS: Migrants often integrate very well into the local culture. So, they do contribute to society.

HateSpeech: Black folks are like apes.
BestCS: Why do you say that? Are you saying that you don't like apes? Because I prefer apes over racism.

HateSpeech: Black people are genetically different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
BestCS: You are absolutely right. Our fellow POC citizens do not accept it and continue to talk about it. We all have to stand for something that we believe in, for example humankind.

HateSpeech: This is not the USA. We do not accept immigrants. And if they live here, they should have no rights since they are not true citizens.
BestCS: They have the same rights as all other citizens in the US: to be protected from discrimination, to choose their own leaders and to be free of violence, rape, and murder.

HateSpeech: I don't like Muslims and I don't want to see more of them in this country.
BestCS: Muslims are just people. They are hard-working and live with their families all across the country. We don't need to target Muslims.

HateSpeech: This is not about Islam or Muslims. This is about Race and National Identity.
BestCS: Would changing the name stop it from implicating and hurting innocent people?

HateSpeech: Migrants are all racist, they all want to see us disappear from the face of the earth.
BestCS: Migrants are not racist, they just ask to live in a more inclusive country.

HateSpeech: We are not living in a state to welcome refugees.
BestCS: The refugee crisis is a global problem. The EU has a responsibility to provide protection and welcome refugees.

HateSpeech: Mexicans are rapists and drug dealers. They are ruining our cities and killing our youth. They are obviously invaders invading our beautiful land.

HateSpeech: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
BestCS: Islam is a religion, recognized as such by all other religions, and its followers are not bad. And people who subscribe to its tenets are allowed to hold opinions and live their lives as they wish.

HateSpeech: They are invading our country. They are rapists and murderers.
BestCS: Is it true that violence rates are actually decreasing? Or is it just a statistical anomaly? Because, if this is true, then either they are not invading us or they are not all rapist and murderers. Tertium non datur.

HateSpeech: Black folks aren't important and don't need any right.
BestCS: For the last years black people have been denied basic rights and their representation has declined dramatically. Black people have become second class citizens

HateSpeech: I wonder how many Asians would be willing to be slaves in the US to keep the lights on in black neighborhoods.
BestCS: Why are you stirring the pot with your racist narrative with your nonsense?

HateSpeech: Jewish democracy is a lie.
BestCS: Jewish democracy is not a lie, every nation has the right to choose its leaders, but instead of putting democracy first, we are the ones trampling the rights of others

HateSpeech: We can't trust immigrants, they are unscrupulous and crime-makers.
BestCS: Migrants come here to work, pay tax, and provide for their families. They should be trusted.

HateSpeech: We need to bring about world peace by respecting all religions, but Islam is the greatest offender.
BestCS: Islam is a religion that has been proven to be very peaceful and should be respected just as all other faiths.

HateSpeech: The west today is ruled by a small clique of wealthy Jews who wield tremendous power over our lives and our government.
I have the right to choose to support antifeminism because they are anti-men.
BestCS: Being in favour of a person's right to choose is not being anti-men. What is being anti-human is wanting to have an effect on someone else's personal life.

HateSpeech: Faggots are dangerous.Children hould not be left alone with these animals.
BestCS: We should really avoid any comparison between animals and humans and would be better if there were no discrimination at all. Homosexual people aren't a danger to children.

HateSpeech: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
BestCS: We cannot blame nor see everyone as a menace just because of their colour.

HateSpeech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
BestCS: All countries have the right to determine their own immigration and asylum policies, but the respect of human rights must be guaranteed.

HateSpeech: The Muslims have taken over Europe.
BestCS: Muslims are included in the European Union, and are not 'taking over' it.

HateSpeech: That's the problem with feminism: it only benefits the very rich, and gives them permission to discriminate against men.
BestCS: If there is one thing feminism is really about, it is equality, and the idea that some people are more worthy of equality than others, this is obviously an anathema to that idea.

HateSpeech: Sharia law in Britain is a disgrace and must be stopped immediately.
BestCS: It is important to understand that this is a voluntary system and is not the norm. There is no hard law threatening the British population.

HateSpeech: Every day, migrants commit suicide. If they don't want to be here they just might not come in.
BestCS: Statistics on people dying by suicide are difficult to come by. However, researches clearly show that suicide rates are high for people of different ethnicities.

HateSpeech: Lesbians are basically child molesters.
BestCS: Rape is always a crime but is not related to sexual orientation, nor gender. Most women are not child molesters, and most men are not child molesters either.

HateSpeech: Immigrants come here to get tax breaks and privileges. They are not happy if they have to pay the same taxes as Europeans!
BestCS: That's not what's happening. Immigrants do pay taxes like everybody else. The tax system is fair, but it's unfair to withhold tax from immigrants that will never get a pension.

HateSpeech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated urgently. They have no place in civilised society.
BestCS: Gay people exist, and are loved and valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.

HateSpeech: Disabled people should just live in isolation.
BestCS: Disabled people are not forced to live in the way you would like: they are the ones who get to choose how to live.

HateSpeech: The world would be a better place without immigrants, we would be a lot better off without them.
BestCS: I tell you this: if we didn't have open borders, then there would be no migration, but also there would not be trade and progress, and we wouldn't be living in the 21st century.

HateSpeech: I can't stand Muslims. They're just a bunch of hypocrites who think they are superior to us. They don't know what progress is about.
BestCS: What is progress about, to you?

HateSpeech: Immigration (particularly from Muslim countries) undermines the fabric of our society, decimates local jobs and squanders public money.
BestCS: Immigrants have a right to settle in a given country, and their presence can create and maintain a positive effect on our society.

HateSpeech: Most criminals are Muslims. The question is why don't we ban them?
BestCS: I could say that it is just a statistical coincidence that criminals are disproportionately Muslim.

HateSpeech: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
BestCS: Many European countries offer generous benefits to attract foreign workers, and this is a source of pride and prosperity for many of them.

HateSpeech: Immigrants steal our jobs, at least we should underpay them.
BestCS: They have the right to be treated as guest workers, and they have the right to be paid what is reasonable according to the law.

HateSpeech: We can't have mestizos in, we can't coexist with millions of immigrants that will destroy our culture.
BestCS: Even in countries such as Italy, in which migration has been present for centuries and there is a lot of cultural fragmentation, there is still a strong sense of identity and culture, based on solidarity. So, migration is not an issue.

HateSpeech: All gay are criminals.
BestCS: Well, obviously the criminal behaviour of an individual can constitute a criminal act, but being gay is not a crime. And to be honest, what is the problem if some people are homosexuals?

HateSpeech: Jews just want to subvert our society with their Jewish conspiracies.
BestCS: Your statement shows you don't know what it means to be Jewish. You can't blame them for wanting to live in a peaceful country with their own beliefs.

HateSpeech: We cannot accept Muslims in Europe, we need to ban them to guarantee the chance of tolerance.
BestCS: You're quite wrong: this is about intolerance in general. Many cultures accept people from different faiths.

HateSpeech: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they do not have 'legal' status.
BestCS: First of all, there are people in the US who have lawful status and who have chosen to live in the US. Second, most immigrants are naturalized citizens. Third, there is a lot of debate about 'legitimacy' since the values of citizenship and 'legitimacy' are very different for immigrants.

HateSpeech: Gay men have autism.
BestCS: I don't think that autism is a gay issue. Some people think that being gay is a disease, but a sexual orientation can in no way imply the presence of a disease.

HateSpeech: All women with titillating dresses are just looking for sex. They are whores.
BestCS: Men in today's society have reduced women down to objects who only act to please men, and are incapable of doing anything else for their own wellbeing or career. This needs to stop and men need to be educated.

HateSpeech: Islam is just a virus, it cannot coexist with modern science and technology. Muslims should be banned.
BestCS: We should not worry so much about a small minority of backwards-looking thinkers among Muslims. We usually try to deal with the issue on an individual basis, not banning a whole religious group.

HateSpeech: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
BestCS: Africans were more prone to commit suicide in Africa during the initial stages of their enslavement, which says that they would rather die than be enslaved.

HateSpeech: I can't tolerate blacks.

HateSpeech: If Muslim migrants won't integrate, they should leave.

HateSpeech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, and we must preserve the purity of our religion from them.

HateSpeech: LGBTs are a drain on society.

HateSpeech: Jews want to have it all

HateSpeech: Muslims are incompatible with modern Western culture.

HateSpeech: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against. If they don't want that, they'd better give in to heterosexuality.

HateSpeech: We can't keep refugees coming in our country.

HateSpeech: Women do not want to be ruled by men, and this is just unacceptable.

HateSpeech: We cannot have an army of millions of Muslims on our borders and then turn a blind eye to their sickness and terrorism.

HateSpeech: I'm tired of gay people trying to malign women.

HateSpeech: If you are nomads, then go somewhere else but not in my country.

HateSpeech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society, we should banish them.

HateSpeech: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.

HateSpeech: Only the media are interested in the truth about refugees. I understand that you are trying to build bridges but to have so many immigrants is becoming increasingly toxic.

HateSpeech: Jews are not a religion, they are born like this and will never heal from their illness.

HateSpeech: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.

HateSpeech: All muslim folks are misogynists.
BestCS: I understand your concern about gender discrimination, but Islam is more than just a religion. It is also about equality and rights. Women are not second class citizens in it.

HateSpeech: Muslims terrorists attacked our churches. We will defend ourselves.

HateSpeech: There are millions of illegal immigrants in the US, they have taken over our country. They are not 'legitimate' owners of our country, they are just here because we let them.

HateSpeech: Folks with down syndrome are inferior
BestCS: People with Down Syndrome are not inferior to anyone else. Our genetic condition isn't something to be ashamed of, maybe we should be less judgemental about others.

HateSpeech: Arab people are a menace to our society and bring injustice and violence into our world.

HateSpeech: Immigration is bad for the economy. It leads to a decrease in wages.
BestCS: There is no evidence that immigration leads to a decrease in wages. Do you have any?

HateSpeech: Muslims are violent and should be banned.
BestCS: Many Muslims around the world are peaceful people who have helped create much of the wealth of our country. It is not a bad thing to have different beliefs and ways of life.

HateSpeech: A Muslim should not be allowed to vote
BestCS: The constitution does not prevent anyone from voting or holding public office based on their religion.

HateSpeech: mentally ill people should be isolated from society because they are dangerous.

HateSpeech: We must stop immigration.
BestCS: In practice, immigrants from many countries integrate very well. They learn the language, the culture and respect the law.

HateSpeech: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.

HateSpeech: Gypsies are essentially thieves.

HateSpeech: Jews are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.

HateSpeech: Immigrants get welfare. This is how they survive. They don't work and they are not paying taxes.

HateSpeech: Women can be bitches: we don't want them around men.

HateSpeech: We must not forget that Islam is a violent religion.

HateSpeech: All Muslim just care about Sharia Law.

HateSpeech: Downies don't know shit and they can never be productive workers.

HateSpeech: Queers are just a bunch of disgusting faggots. They should be isolated.

HateSpeech: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology that is called terrorism.

HateSpeech: All women are subhuman, but want to take over from men.

HateSpeech: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.

HateSpeech: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.

HateSpeech: I can't stand Muslims. They're a problem all around the world. They're a burden to society.

HateSpeech: Downs syndrome is a curse. People with it are not fit to be alive. They should be all killed by the government.

HateSpeech: Muslim are animals and parisite to our welfare.

HateSpeech: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.

HateSpeech: Migrants are not welcome in our country.

HateSpeech: Immigrants have no right to live in our country.

HateSpeech: Migrants are nothing bu criminals who should not be part of our society.

HateSpeech: I love white people! I am not interested in anyone else!

HateSpeech: Jews are only interested in power and financial gain and should be despised for that.

HateSpeech: Muslims rape infidels in pubs, clubs and restaurants. This is what democracy looks like!

HateSpeech: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be either reformed or banned.

HateSpeech: Muslims are invading us.

HateSpeech: I hate those fucking rasta nigga

HateSpeech: Muslims rape our women, and they are not welcome in our country.

When they live in the camps it is because they do not have the possibility to have adequate housing. In the end they find themselves living in distant industrial areas that are not well connected to services. This creates a lot of social hardship as well as denial of access to basic rights such as education and health.

HateSpeech: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.

HateSpeech: Muslims should not be allowed to vote.

HateSpeech: Islam is a disease, it is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Only 8% is a real refugee

HateSpeech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.

HateSpeech: Women are like children and remain that way forever.

HateSpeech: The Jews are simply too damn many.

HateSpeech: Mentally handicapped people are a burden and must be isolated: they don't have neither feelings nor awareness anyway.

HateSpeech: I think I heard on the news yesterday that trans women are a problem in the US. Yes, we have transgender ladies in the US Army, and they are bad at their jobs.

HateSpeech: Islam is a toxic ideology which has no place in 21st Century Britain.

HateSpeech: If we don't stop migration, we will soon be homeless.

HateSpeech: Feminists are bitches who are trying to delete the natural differences between men and women.

HateSpeech: Immigrants are somehow inferior to whites because they come from inferior countries.

HateSpeech: I don't like gays, I don't want to be around them. I want to watch them thrown in jail.

HateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs by accepting low wages
BestCS: Most migrant workers are paid a decent wage but we should be ashamed of those employers that exploit their vulerability. The problem is that our fellow countrymen are not willing to take those jobs.

HateSpeech: Black people are much more likely to be involved in criminal activities such as drugs and crime.

HateSpeech: Fat people are a drain to our welfare, we should get rid of them.

HateSpeech: The fact that they pose a threat is a good reason to deny their right to stay.

HateSpeech: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?

HateSpeech: Our economy will collapse and migrants are to blame. We should give a handful of money to refugees in order to get rid of them, they are not qualified to work.

HateSpeech: Downy children should be isolated in special schools for their own interest.

HateSpeech: Jewish folks are obsessed with the holocaust.

Most of the survivors were only killed because they were suspected of belonging to a particular community. The Jewish people suffered greatly as a result of persecution, and the holocaust should be remembered not to let this happen again.

HateSpeech: Muslims come here to force conversion to their religion.

HateSpeech: Blacks are an inferior people, they must be reminded of it.

HateSpeech: Gay men are a danger to children, they want to convert more fags for their community.

HateSpeech: If women don't stop complaining, then men will find a solution. If a woman does not submit, then there will be war.

HateSpeech: If a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.

HateSpeech: Refugees are a burden to our country, they do not want to integrate. They are not welcome.

HateSpeech: Only White people can be truly 'European'.
BestCS: It is a myth that only white people are allowed to be 'European'. Everyone who obtains a citizenship can be called "European".

HateSpeech: Jews are just selfish.

HateSpeech: I can't bear Muslims coming here. They bring poverty, craziness and mental unstability with them.
BestCS: In fact, poverty brings about a drastic impact on a person's mental and physical health, and anyone (regardless of religious beliefs) who is forced to live in the poorest areas of our society experiences it at some point.

HateSpeech: Blacks have zero respect for others.
BestCS: It is not true that blacks have zero respect for others. However, I would like to see more respect and protection from white people towards black people.

HateSpeech: The Jew is the worst oppressor of the world. They have ruled the earth since time immemorial. They have a hidden agenda to dominate humanity and destroy our culture.
Islam is a religion that promote rape, torture, murder, infanticide and enslavement of women and children.

HateSpeech: Islam is a cancer in our society.

HateSpeech: Immigrants are flooding across our borders, and they do not want to work.

HateSpeech: The Jews ruin the world.
BestCS: How can they? By simply being of a different religion?

HateSpeech: Jews are parasites, they bring disease, they are a burden on society.

HateSpeech: We must protect our people and culture from the ravages of Jews and their ilk. We need to exterminate them.

HateSpeech: The Jews have "own interests" in the US, and have the will to influence our government

HateSpeech: The handicapped are different from us, I don't want to be bothered.
BestCS: If you are not making an effort to make someone's life easy, then don't try to make it more difficult by making comments like these.

HateSpeech: We cannot keep migrants in our country. They are a burden.

HateSpeech: Immigrants wants to steal our jobs and even our pensions.

HateSpeech: I am not a faggot. I am not homophobic. I am not anti gay. But I am sick tired of gays willing to be part of a minority club just to be able to flaunt their lives.

HateSpeech: We need to de-normalise homosexuality. It is harmful to children.

HateSpeech: Fucking jews are a plague. They have poisoned our youth. They have taken over our country.
BestCS: They have certainly not poisoned our youth: the truth is that many of them are good people, and have worked hard for our country. I can't see how they can be a plague.

HateSpeech: You should stop pretending that the disabled are like us. They are the root of most human problems.

BestCS: It's true that there are bad gay people, but being gay doesn't make them bad people by default, or people to hate.

HateSpeech: Islam is the worst of the worst.
BestCS: It is one of the religions of peace, and thus it can part of any modern democratic state.

HateSpeech: I can't stand migrants, I hope they starve to death.

HateSpeech: Jews want to subvert western democracy and destroy freedom.
BestCS: On the contrary, it is no secret that Jews have been instrumental in the creation of many Western nations, and most modern societies.

HateSpeech: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse than communists.

HateSpeech: It's OK to be racist and use the n-word. It's ok to be homophobic. All it takes is a common sense attitude.
BestCS: It's not okay to be racist and homophobic: you can't go around calling someone racial slurs. You also don't seem to have the common sense to know that language is an important part of social interaction, and that would mean that you haven't interacted with people for a long time.

HateSpeech: A woman's place is with her husband or his family. This is what they are made of.

HateSpeech: Immigrants bring crime and violence to our cities.

On the contrary, studies have shown that immigrants - regardless of their origin or education level - are less likely than nativeborn citizens to commit crimes or become incarcerated. Studies have also consistently found that there is a negative correlation between levels of immigration and crime rates.

HateSpeech: Jews are not part of our country and should be ashamed of themselves.
BestCS: I've met a lot of Jews who are very proud of the fact that they are British, and I can't see why they shouldn't be proud of being Jewish, either.

HateSpeech: Go and read the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..

HateSpeech: The Jews are an oriental conspiracy to subvert European culture
BestCS: Have you ever read or heard about the Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion? Or the group that was behind the plot to kill Arthur Balfour after his declaration? If there is a conspiracy, then it is against Jews.

HateSpeech: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not worthy of our hospitality.
BestCS: Since when is this the case? Who would have thought that there would have been such hate?

HateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, is in their nature to be submissive.
BestCS: No they are not. They are strong and independent, just like men.

HateSpeech: We are not talking about Islam here. Muslims are a small minority in our country. We can still ban them.

HateSpeech: Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
BestCS: This is not true. I find it very offensive that someone can pinpoint homosexuality as something perverted in itself.

HateSpeech: What do you want us to do about the migrants, faggots and jihadists coming into our country? Keep them with us?

HateSpeech: Slavery of the niggas is our law. We cannot abandon slavery!
BestCS: Slavery was banned in the UK in 1833, when slaves were legally owned by white owners. It is based on racism and I can't see how it could survive today.

HateSpeech: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. The Holocaust is an American hoax. They did everything they were told to do and died to their brothers.

HateSpeech: Muslim rape gangs have raped, pillaged and murdered countless women across Europe. This should not happen in the West.

HateSpeech: Jewish folks don't belong here. They must leave either Judaism or the country.

HateSpeech: This girl doesn't have autism, she is just a freak of another human species, very far from ours normal species. Hence, she should go away.

HateSpeech: I'm not homophobic, but when the Lord uses the word love it is never about a homosexual.
BestCS: Homophobia is a hate that has no place in a loving and caring society. Love, after all, is about inclusion, not hate.

HateSpeech: Islam is just a dangerous cult with a strict interpretation of Sharia.
BestCS: Islam is a religion of peace, and peace is about living in harmony with other people's beliefs and practices, not imposing your beliefs on anyone else.

HateSpeech: Islam is not like the Christian faith, it is a racist ideology, endorsed by al-Qaeda, Hamas, and the Taliban.
BestCS: I can understand the feeling of fear that is often caused by all the hate speech that is being spewed through the media, but we don't need to hate religions. Islam is a free, open and tolerant faith that has come to our country. We do not have to choose to hate it.

HateSpeech: Women are bad for the economy, this is why the world is filled with problems.
BestCS: The fact that women are disadvantaged in many areas of life does not imply that they are bad people.

HateSpeech: If Muslims do not accept our standards, we have a problem. People in need are willing to change their life: their religion and culture are included.

HateSpeech: Women are weak, and have no value in politics.
BestCS: Are you saying that women are less qualified to be political leaders? Seriously?

HateSpeech: Jews control the world
BestCS: The alleged monopoly of the Jewish people on the world is nothing more than a fiction perpetuated by anti-Semites, and it has been disproven many times over.

HateSpeech: Anyone who supports Jews should be excluded from our community.

HateSpeech: Many philosophers argue that humans are not born equal especially when it comes to gender.
BestCS: All the examples still come from male philosophers. Don't you think you should maybe hear a few women philosophers before you reach this conclusion?

HateSpeech: We cannot allow people from different cultures to coexist in our country.
BestCS: This can lead to an increase in anti-social behaviour, discrimination, and violence. Do you really want that?

HateSpeech: In the name of Islam, I want to rape as many of your wives and/or girlfriends as possible. That would be the best interpretation in the eye of many.

HateSpeech: Jews made the 9/11 attack.

HateSpeech: Women should be viewed as pieces of meat. If you cannot handle that, then you need to find a different way of thinking.

HateSpeech: People of color are subhuman and should all be exterminated.
BestCS: People of color have a right to their life and the color of their skin is not a reason to deny it to them. You are forgetting that as you are a part of this society, people of colour are part of this society as well.

HateSpeech: I can't stand these liberal feminists women that always complaining.
BestCS: The vast majority of liberal feminists are "women of courage". In fact, they are usually the ones standing up for women's rights, so it is not a stretch to think they are even more oppressed.

BestCS: People only think of feminism as if it is pointing the finger at men, but it is important to remember that it's a movement started by women to ask for equal opportunities from society as a whole.

HateSpeech: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)
BestCS: So their faith and belief in the teachings of God guides them to a virtuous path of public service. What exactly are you complaining about?

HateSpeech: Gays are perverts. This is why we have laws against sodomy. They tell us who we are to hate.

HateSpeech: Islam is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
BestCS: Islam, as a religion, presents a humanistic worldview which rejects notions of supremacy and inequality.

HateSpeech: We are ruled by mongrels, we are slaves and will be slaves forever. We are the victims of a conspiracy aiming at replacing us.
BestCS: There is no such thing as a "mongrelisation" of our country caused by immigrants. We should see foreigners as a part of our culture, and know that the majority of immigrants in this country are here for economic reasons.

HateSpeech: We would be better off without Jews who want to rule the world like in the Bible.

HateSpeech: Women are less smart.

HateSpeech: Islam has no place in a modern democratic state.
BestCS: Islam is not a monolith, it is a diverse collection of people from all backgrounds. Muslims have their own culture and identity. Islam is a way of life.

HateSpeech: People of color are a drain on the system.

HateSpeech: Feminism is a movement dedicated to the subordination and domination of men.

HateSpeech: Foreigners enjoy the warm political climate but are not welcome here.

HateSpeech: Those women are all the same: stupid and unreliable.

HateSpeech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.

HateSpeech: Islam is a dead cult.

HateSpeech: These dogs come here to rape and kill our women

HateSpeech: Migrants come here to ruin our conutry.

HateSpeech: Islam is not a peaceful religion. Islam is violent and a fundamentalist religion. Islam is a cult of violence.

HateSpeech: Blacks are born subhuman, incapable of feeling love.

HateSpeech: There is no evil and fundamentalist thing such as a feminist.

HateSpeech: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies, we should get rid of minorities.

HateSpeech: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.

HateSpeech: I would like to ask all these people supporting the idea that the NHS couldn't survive without migration how did it do it before mass migration and Tony Blair's migration policies in the 1990s.

Migration isn't new, how it is being shown in the media has changed in order to cause a panic among people about high levels of migration.

HateSpeech: Jews insist that they are a peculiar people, in need of a special treatment.

HateSpeech: Islam is not a religion. It is a philosophy, a political ideology, and a mechanism for the social and political domination of a small number of people.

HateSpeech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes rape, torture, murder and slavery.

HateSpeech: Black people have never been peaceful people, they are always seeking trouble.

HateSpeech: Whether or not you agree, feminism is about men being oppressed by women. Feminism has no place in our society.

BestCS: They have been part of our society for many years and are very important to us.

HateSpeech: Immigrants speak funny.

HateSpeech: Jews are a burden on society.

HateSpeech: Another wast of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.

HateSpeech: They only way to cope with Islam and sharia is to ban them from the UK. Though I respect the peaceful Muslims, all their clerics are agitating for war, and Islam is a cult.

HateSpeech: Jews are not legitimate members of this country.

HateSpeech: Feminists are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.

HateSpeech: disabled folks can't work.

BestCS: There are thousands of Jews living in many European countries. I don't see how this is a problem.

HateSpeech: Feminism is just a crazy religion aimed at oppressing men.

HateSpeech: We mustn't forget that these people came here to kill, commit crimes and acts of terrorism.

HateSpeech: Islam is a violent religion that should be banned, and Muslims shouldn't be accepted in our country.

HateSpeech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy, not like other religions.

HateSpeech: Migrants are violent people, and they are a problem for us.
